name: Kleopatra - Demo Version
description:
If you enjoy this demo, please wishlist on Steam.

Kleopatra is a hybrid Visual Novel / Action RPG that combines a retro cyberpunk noir narrative with stat-based shooting gallery combat.

Story

You are the imperial android assassin Hatori, sent on a mission to the dangerous asteroid city Kleopatra. Your creator has tasked you with finding and eliminating Espada, a mysterious gang leader. Along the way, you receive assistance from a local bounty hunter named Klover, who seems to awaken strange memories and emotions you never knew you had.

Gameplay

Shoot and slash your way through the main story while discovering optional side stories. Clear waves of enemies in Time Attack or Survival modes to earn credits for purchasing combat upgrades. Choose dialogue options to express your character and deepen relationships with other characters.

  • Retro cyberpunk noir Visual Novel with multiple romance options.
  • Shooting gallery Action RPG combat with customizable abilities and stats.
  • New Game Plus feature for enhanced replayability.
